References

Alford, Matthew H., Thomas Peacock, Jennifer A. MacKinnon, Jonathan D. Nash, Maarten C. Buijsman, Luca R. Centurioni, Shenn-Yu Chao, et al. 2015. “The Formation and Fate of Internal Waves in the South China Sea.” Nature 521 (7550): 65–69. https://doi.org/10.1038/nature14399.
Pickering, Andy, and Matthew H. Alford. 2012. “Velocity Structure of Internal Tide Beams Emanating from Kaena Ridge, Hawaii.” Journal of Physical Oceanography 42 (6): 1039–44. https://doi.org/10.1175/jpo-d-12-018.1.
Pickering, Andy, Matthew Alford, Jonathan Nash, Luc Rainville, Maarten Buijsman, Dong Shan Ko, and Byungho Lim. 2015. “Structure and Variability of Internal Tides in Luzon Strait.” Journal of Physical Oceanography 45 (6): 1574–94. https://doi.org/10.1175/jpo-d-14-0250.1.
